programs.programDescription: Seattle Mentors is a mayoral initiative focused on youth mentorship managed by Seattle Parks & Recreation with a collaborative approach amongst city departments, and other public and private sectors in Seattle.
programs.activityDescription: Seattle Mentors promotes impactful mentorship, social/emotional health, and career exposure opportunities, where young people connect with one or more caring adults. The program includes various mentoring opportunities aimed at empowering youth to reach their full potential.
